definitions.definition: A device that charges or recharges
definitions.example: Put the batteries in the charger overnight so we can use them tomorrow.

definitions.definition: A large horse trained for battle and used by the cavalry (of a lighter build than a destrier)
definitions.example: The knight rode a white charger.

definitions.definition: A large decorative plate, sometimes used under dinner plates or other savoury-dish vessels in a multi-course meal; also service plate or underplate
definitions.example: The fancy restaurant used a white porcelain charger when serving.

definitions.definition: A speedloader that holds several cartridges together in a single unit for easier loading of a firearm's magazine
A rectal concealment container for prohibited material such as money, drugs and tools
